org.ensembl.driver
Class DriverManager

java.lang.Object
  org.ensembl.driver.DriverManager
public class DriverManager
extends java.lang.Object

Utility for creating drivers from a Properties format configuration files.

    The files can be specifed as:
  • Filepaths. Relative to current working directory or absolute.
  • Resources. File paths relative to the classpath.
  • URLs.

See Also:

Method Detail

loadDriver

public static CoreDriver loadDriver(java.util.Properties driverConfig)
                             throws ConfigurationException
Creates an instance of the driver specified by the ensembl_driver parameter in the configuration and calls driver.initialise(configuration).

If the property "ensembl_driver" is ommitted the default "org.ensembl.driver.impl.CoreDriverImpl".

Parameters:
driverConfig - configuration for a specific driver.
Throws:
ConfigurationException - if it fails to create and instance of the driver or the driver can not be configured, for example due to missing parameters.
See Also:
CoreDriverImpl, CoreDriver

loadVariationDriver

public static VariationDriver loadVariationDriver(java.util.Properties driverConfig)
                                           throws ConfigurationException
Creates an instance of the driver specified by the ensembl_driver parameter in the configuration and calls driver.initialise(configuration).

If the property "ensembl_driver" is ommitted the default "org.ensembl.variation.driver.impl.VariationDriverImpl" is used.

Parameters:
driverConfig - configuration for a specific driver.
Throws:
ConfigurationException - if it fails to create and instance of the driver or the driver can not be configured, for example due to missing parameters.
See Also:
VariationDriverImpl, CoreDriver

loadVariationDriver

public static VariationDriver loadVariationDriver(java.lang.String fileReference)
                                           throws ConfigurationException
Creates an instance of the driver specified by the ensembl_driver parameter in the configuration and calls driver.initialise(configuration).

If the property "ensembl_driver" is ommitted the default "org.ensembl.variation.driver.impl.MySQLVariationDriver" is used.

Parameters:
fileReference - filepath or url, url can be relative to classpath
Throws:
ConfigurationException - if it fails to create and instance of the driver or the driver can not be configured, for example due to missing parameters.
See Also:
VariationDriverImpl, CoreDriver

loadEnsemblDriver

public static EnsemblDriver loadEnsemblDriver(java.util.Properties driverConfig)
                                       throws ConfigurationException
Creates an instance of the driver specified by the ensembl_driver parameter in the configuration and calls driver.initialise(configuration).

Parameters:
driverConfig - filepath or url, url can be relative to classpath
Returns:
driver configured with parameters in file.
Throws:
ConfigurationException

load

public static CoreDriver load(java.util.Properties driverConfig)
                       throws ConfigurationException
Creates an instance of the driver specified by the ensembl_driver parameter in the configuration and calls driver.initialise(configuration).

If the property "ensembl_driver" is ommitted the default of "org.ensembl.driver.impl.CoreDriverImpl" is used. This is a synonym for loadDriver(Properties) and is kept for backwards compatibility.

Parameters:
driverConfig - configuration parameters specifiying the driver
Returns:
driver configured with parameters in file.
Throws:
ConfigurationException
See Also:
loadDriver(Properties)

                             throws ConfigurationException
Creates an instance of the driver specified by the ensembl_driver parameter in the configuration and calls driver.initialise(configuration).

If the property "ensembl_driver" is ommitted the default "org.ensembl.driver.impl.CoreDriverImpl" is used.

driver configured with parameters in file.
Throws:
ConfigurationException

load

public static CoreDriver load(java.lang.String fileReference)
                       throws ConfigurationException
Creates an instance of the driver specified by the ensembl_driver parameter in the configuration and calls driver.initialise(configuration).

If the property "ensembl_driver" is ommitted it defaults to "org.ensembl.driver.impl.CoreDriverImpl". This is a synonym for loadDriver(String) and is kept for backwards compatibility.

Parameters:
fileReference - filepath or url, url can be relative to classpath
Returns:
driver configured with parameters in file.
Throws:
ConfigurationException
See Also:
loadDriver(String)
